intro.description: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of the Eme Comercio website, located in Montevideo. By accessing this website, you accept these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not use our website.
usage.description1: The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and personal use only. It is subject to change without notice.
usage.description2: Eme Comercio reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the website or any part of it with or without notice.
accounts.description1: To access certain features of our site, you may need to register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for all activities that occur under your account.
accounts.description2: Eme Comercio will not be liable for any damage or loss arising from the failure to comply with this security obligation.
products.description1: All products and services offered through Eme Comercio are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any product or service we offer.
products.description2: The prices of our products are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue a product at any time.
purchase.description1: By placing an order on our website, you are offering to purchase a product subject to these terms and conditions. All orders are subject to product availability and order price confirmation.
purchase.description2: Eme Comercio reserves the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, even after the order has been confirmed.
delivery.description1: Eme Comercio delivers through courier service providers. Delivery times vary depending on the customer's location and product availability.
delivery.description2: We are not responsible for delivery delays that are beyond our control.
returns.description1: Returns and refunds are handled according to our return policy, available at [link to return policy].
returns.description2: Eme Comercio reserves the right to refuse returns if the product does not meet the conditions of our return policy.
intellectualProperty.description: All content included on this website, such as text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, and software, is the property of Eme Comercio or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws.
liability.description: Eme Comercio will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from the use or inability to use the products or services on our website.
modifications.description: Eme Comercio reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will take effect immediately upon being posted on this page.
law.description: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where Eme Comercio is registered, and any disputes related to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that jurisdiction.
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at emecomerciooficial@gmail.com.
